const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "museums",
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      location: {
        type: "geo_point",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

  index: "museums",
  size: 0,
  query: {
    match: {
      name: "musée",

  aggs: {
